column2: ggplot(data=dat, aes(x=reorder(country, -values), y=values, fill=values)) + geom_bar(stat="identity") + ggtitle("COVID-19 Confirmed Cases Top 20 Countries") + labs(y="Confirmed Cases", x = "Country", fill="Confirmed Cases")  + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90), plot.title=element_text(hjust=0.5))
